Ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, nke a na-akpọ Western Momo mgbe a na-ewere ya dị ka akụkụ nke otu Momo ma ọ bụ mgbe Momo gụnyere na Grassfields, bụ obere alaka nke asụsụ ndịda Bantoid nke a na-asụ n'ubi ahịhịa dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ nke Cameroon.
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Manta (Tanka, Batakpa), Balo (Alunfa), Osatu, Busam, MenkaʹAtoŋ.
E kewara ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a dị ka Tivoid, ọnọdụ gosipụtara na Ethnologue.
Blench (2010) na-amata otu obere nhazi nhazi ise n'ime Southwest Grassfields.
